channel.title: Matrix Background(Partially changes). Just need some insight
channel.description: I'm able to change the background sometimes. Like I will run it and the background will be changed but if i do all the frames I need only 1 will be changed. So I do it multiple times. And it will change a few frames but then ill do it another time and then it won't work. No specific way I'm doing it just trying my best to get client changed. Any tips on a problem of this? Don't post on here saying you need help just gtfo atleast I know what im doing for the most part.
